columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: billingChargeIdentifier
columns.description: Billing charge identifiers to be used for CASS. Refer to CargoXML Code List 1.33

columns.name: chargePaymentType
columns.description: Indicates if charge is prepaid or collect (P; C)

columns.name: chargeType
columns.description: Charge type related to amount total as per bullet points 2/21 - data elements 24A - 3B  from AWB

columns.name: entitlement
columns.description: Entitlement code to define if charges are Due carrier (C) or Due agent (A). Refer to CXML Code List 1.3

columns.name: forPrices
columns.description: Reference to the Prices based on this Ratings

columns.name: otherChargeCode
columns.description: Refer to CargoXML Code List 1.2 for Other Charges

columns.name: rcp
columns.description: IATA 3-letter city code of the rate combination point as defined in TACT

columns.name: chargeDescription
columns.description: Description of the charge e.g. Airfreight; fuel; etc.

columns.name: priceReferenceId
columns.description: Reference to a price reference if existing (e.g. Allotment number; contract reference; etc.)

columns.name: priceSpecification
columns.description: Specification of the price e.g. Street; Group; Spot; etc.

columns.name: quantity
columns.description: Quantity for the charge if applicable
